titleStmt.title: A proclamation discharging the receipt of the rebels lately in armes in the VVest
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, Printer to the King's most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated at end: Given at Edinburgh the fourth day of December, and of Our Reign the eighteenth year, one thousand six hundred sixty six.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
